elements.title: News(Top News : The outdoor mask mandate will be lifted beginning Monday, one and a half years after the rules were imposed, but the incoming administration isn't happy with the timing.) - 2022.04.29 PM5

News(Top News : National Assembly Speaker Park Byeong-seug calls for a plenary session after a last-ditch attempt by rival parties to close the gap on disputed prosecution reform bills falls through.) - 2022.04.27 PM5

News(Top News : The floor leaders of the rival parties fail to iron out differences regarding the arbitrated prosecution reform revisions after the People Power Party withdrew its endorsement.) - 2022.04.26 PM5
News(Top News : The infectious disease level of COVID-19 is downgraded to Class Two amid the continued slowdown of the pandemic.) - 2022.04.25 PM5

News(Top News : Rival political parties accept the parliamentary speaker's mediatory proposal on reform bills that would strip the prosecution of its investigative powers, but senior prosecutors quit en masse.) - 2022.04.22 PM5

News(Top News : The Democratic Party asks the parliamentary speaker to convene a plenary session on Friday, pushing ahead with reform bills that would strip the prosecution of its investigative authority.) - 2022.04.21 PM5
News(Top News : A Democratic Party lawmaker defects from the party in an attempt to help pass bills stripping the prosecution of their investigative powers.) - 2022.04.20 PM5
